reviewText: Needed this item for Mother's Day and it arrived in plenty of time.  It was easy to order and sent the next day.
This is a great collection for a cold winter Sunday afternoon with a cup of hot chocolate and a soft blanket!
I really enjoyed the movies in this collection, especially the movies based on the Nicholas Sparks' novels.  I recommend this collection if you like tear jerker movies because it certainly delivers.

Appreciated Walk to Remember but the other two movies were assigned to the garbage because of offensive language. A package of DVDs should be of equal language rating as well as moral rating when they come together. Acting wasn't  equal quality.
I ordered this for my daughter because she loves these tear jerkers and she also has the books. She has watched them several times over since we have owned.
these movies are great to curl up on a couch with they never get boring to watch and every time you've watched them you want to get the book out.
purchased and received my DVDs withing a reasonable time. And, it arrived on my birthday!  A Walk To Remember is one of my all time favorites. :)
These movies are great, my girlfriend loved it, however not all of them come with spanish subtittle, this is something you need to consider if you want to practice your spanish

I cant believe that I still cry when I watch these movies.... I love this box set. YAYA is a fun movie with the tear jerking when we find out about Sidalees mothers first love. A WALK TO REMEMBER is definately a great movie. That is definately a tear jerker. Message IN A BOTTLE is also good. I must admit that I had not seen it before I bought this set and I cried... thank goodness I can watch these at home ... lol
My husband and I liked this set so much that he got a set for his mother...
